title: Gym Chain  Equinox Gets  New Loans  ----  By Alexander Saeedy and Alexander Gladstone
text:
Equinox Group LLC has obtained $255 million in new financing commitments from some of its lenders and owners, as the cash-strapped gym chain seeks to bolster its liquidity, according to people familiar with the matter.

The lenders extending new financing include Bank of America Corp., Citigroup Inc., and Goldman Sachs Group Inc., these people said. Executives at property developer RelatedCos. who own a stake in Equinox are also providing funds, according to the people familiar with the matter.

Beyond adding cash to the balance sheet, Equinox aims for the financing to serve as a bridge as it explores a potential transaction with a special-purpose acquisition company, they said.

Bank of America agreed to provide a $74 million term loan that will pay off the outstanding balance of an existing revolving credit facility, the people said, while a consortium of banks provided a new $76 million revolving line of credit for the company.
